questionText:
Please ensure your submission of the following application requirements: 
	Baccalaureate Degree Must be completed from an accredited higher education institution prior to matriculation.  A minimum undergraduate overall GPA of 2.50 is required.
�	Two Individual Letters of Recommendation � Two letters of recommendation are required from former professors or employers familiar with the applicant�s professional or educational capabilities.
�	Personal Statement/Essay � Must state your reasons for pursuit of this course of study, your learning goals, and the qualities you feel will make you a successful candidate for an online program.
�	Resume � Should include information regarding educational history (colleges attended and degrees earned); any clinical and research experiences; professional organizations, community activities, honors, and leadership responsibilities; research experience, publications, or presentations; include a brief description of any ongoing research in which you are involved.
�	Awards, Honors, Publications & Scholarships, including honorary societies � Should be articulated in achievements section.
�	Extracurricular or community service activities, including offices held � Should be articulated in the experiences section.
�	Research experiences, including facility, type, duration and supervisor � Should be articulated in the experiences section.
